amendment.description: Manager's amendment makes various and sundry clarifications, additions, and technical changes.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in Part B of House Report 111-582 to clarify certain provisisons in the bill and add various requirements.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Rahall amendment (A001) Agreed to by recorded vote: 250 - 161, 1 Present (Roll no. 507).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Rahall.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
